revision.text: '''Kasib''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. Letting any berry wither after unlocking any [[Berries#Gen 4 Berries|Gen 4]] or [[Berries#Gen 5 Berries|5]] berry has a 5% chance of spawning a Kasib plant in its place, as long as there are no [[Colbur]] plants in the farm. [[Farming Setups]] using Kasib can be found [[Farming Setups#Sprinklotad Leveling Strategy|here]].
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
